body:
Basic Info
==========

  -- ----------- ----------------------------------
         email : jishnua511@gmail.com
         Phone : +91 7702 102 164
       Address : 1-2-90/4/1, Habsiguda, Hyderabad
  -- ----------- ----------------------------------

  -- ------------ ------------------------------------------
         github : https://github.com/jishnupdas
         social : https://www.instagram.com/jish_p_das
       facebook : https://www.facebook.com/jishnupdas
  -- ------------ ------------------------------------------

About me
========

To grow and improve abilities, Learn new things from experiences and
relations. Meet new people and develop a network of intellectually
competent creative professionals attuned to the shifting tides of modern
world. To make a positive impact and impart a sense of scientific spirit
and culture in this fast paced world of 21[^st]

Education
=========

**MSc Astronomy** [*University College of Science, Osmania
University*]


**BSc Physical sciences** [*Nizam college, Hyderabad*]



Experience
==========

**Head - R&D** [*NEXT-STEP Career Academy for Research & Excellence*]

**Project fellow** [*Department of Astronomy, Osmania University*]

**Developer - Python** [*University College of Science, Osmania University*]

**Resource Person** [*Department of Astronomy, Osmania University*]

**Speaker, STEM Educator** [*PanIndia*]

**Guest Speaker** [*Hyderabad*]


Hard skills
===========

-   **Astronomy**

    -   Variable star studies in optical, IR. Observation and analysis

    -   Galaxy clusters and their morphologies

    -   Astrophotography

    -   Pop science speaker, educator\

-   **Data Science**

    -   Python: OOP and functional programming

    -   Data Analysis and visualization (pandas, matplotlib)

    -   Scientific and ML libraries (numpy, scipy, sklearn.)\

-   **Technology**

    -   Windows, MacOS, \*nix/Linux systems & shell environments

    -   git, shell scripting, SQL, system admin, networking

    -   LaTeX, Microsoft Office suite

    -   Photography & image processing. GIMP, Adobe PS & LR.\

Soft Skills
===========

-   Good communication and interpersonal skills.

-   Public speaking and presentation

-   Inquisitive and scientific attitude.

-   Problem solver, mentally agile and resilient.

-   Good knowledge in the fields of physics, astronomy.

-   Awareness of advancements in computers and technology.

Languages
=========

- English
- Malayalam
- Hindi
- Telugu
- Tamil

Interests
=========

-   Deep and passionate love for visual arts and literature.

-   Photography (travel, landscape, astro) and painting.

-   History, Psychology, Philosophy and the natural world.

-   Traveling, Adventures and Memories of the road.

-   Artificial Intelligence, Deep learning; the impact and implications
    of these technologies on human societies.

Personal
========

Peace for all beings in the universe.\
Resolution in war, Defiance in defeat, Magnanimity in victory, Goodwill
in Peace.\
Vegtarian, family of parents & two fluffy dogs.\
Has explored the land, cultures, and cuisines of peninsular India.

Publications
============

**Comprehensive Study of a Neglected Contact Binary TYC 5532-1333-1**
*S. Devarapalli +*

**Photometric study of 61 total eclipsing contact binaries from ASAS,
OGLE, HATNet, AST3 and TESS databases** *Rukmini J. +*

**A Discussion on T-Tauri proto planetary disks and modelling of planet
formation and conditions for planet formation** *Jishnu P. +*


Achievements
============

Conference Talk

**Conference Talk** [*IUCAA,Pune*]

Poster Presentation

**Poster Presentation** [*SNBOSE CBS, Kolkata.*]

Conference Talk

**Conference Talk** [*IIST Trivandrum*]

QUIZ events

**QUIZ events** [*Pan India*]

Extra Curricular

**Extra Curricular** [*Osmania University*]


Additional Courses & Workshops
==============================

Attended Indo-French Spectroscopy School **IFAS-5** and completed short
term project on *Polarimetry* at **IUCAA, Pune**.

Workshop on *Photometer Fabrication and training* conducted by
**ACE-TLC** at **IUCAA, Pune**.

Got selected and attended (**GROWTH**) projects' *Winter school* at
**IIT Bombay**.

Attended webminar on data analysis of **Astrosat** India's first
multiwavelength space telescope.

Attended the *Big data analytics and social media analysis* workshop
Organised under **TEQUIP III** in **UCE**.

Attended the **FDP** in *Python programming for statistical data
analysis* at **Dept of Statistics, UCS (OU)**.

Attended **ICON** 2 days Management workshop at Kochi.

Attended 3 days *Trainer the Trainer program*.

Attended 2 days *Advanced Presentation skills Program*.
